title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary(): special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(libminer)  lib_summary() #>                                                                   Library #> 1               C:/Users/jshadle/AppData/Local/Programs/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2 C:/Users/jshadle/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmpe48qyA/temp_libpatha18478052b5b #>   n_packages #> 1        339 #> 2          1 # specify sizes = TRUE lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                   Library #> 1               C:/Users/jshadle/AppData/Local/Programs/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2 C:/Users/jshadle/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmpe48qyA/temp_libpatha18478052b5b #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1        339 970592467 #> 2          1     17301 summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical value indicating whether calculate sizes. Default 'FALSE'.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72705457 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
